languages.text: "Теперь мы думаем, что это не все. Что есть другая грань, которую мы не видим. Больший смысл, чем мы можем исчислить. Что-то, что стоит выше страхов, потребностей. Что движет ими всеми".

traits.locale_text: "Я не демон. И не... Я точно не демон".

languages.text: "Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."
languages.original_text: "Теперь мы думаем, что это не все. Что есть другая грань, которую мы не видим. Больший смысл, чем мы можем исчислить. Что-то, что стоит выше страхов, потребностей. Что движет ими всеми".

traits.locale_text: "Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

"Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

"Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

"Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

languages.text: « Désormais, nous estimons qu'il y a davantage. Qu'il y a autre chose que nous ne voyons pas, une notion plus importante que ce que nous sommes en mesure de calculer. Quelque chose au-delà des craintes et des besoins. Quelque chose qui les pousse en avant. »
languages.original_text: "Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

traits.locale_text: « Désormais, nous estimons qu'il y a davantage. Qu'il y a autre chose que nous ne voyons pas, une notion plus importante que ce que nous sommes en mesure de calculer. Quelque chose au-delà des craintes et des besoins. Quelque chose qui les pousse en avant. »

languages.text: “现在我们认为还有更多，还有更多我们看不到的另一面。某种超出我们计算能力的庞大概念，某种超越恐惧与需求的东西，某种驱使他们的东西。”
languages.original_text: "Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

traits.locale_text: “现在我们认为还有更多，还有更多我们看不到的另一面。某种超出我们计算能力的庞大概念，某种超越恐惧与需求的东西，某种驱使他们的东西。”

languages.text: "Nun glauben wir, dass es mehr gibt. Dass es eine andere Seite gibt, die wir nicht sehen. Ein Konzept, das größer ist, als wir es berechnen können. Etwas, das über Ängsten und Bedürfnissen steht. Etwas, das sie antreibt."
languages.original_text: "Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

traits.locale_text: "Nun glauben wir, dass es mehr gibt. Dass es eine andere Seite gibt, die wir nicht sehen. Ein Konzept, das größer ist, als wir es berechnen können. Etwas, das über Ängsten und Bedürfnissen steht. Etwas, das sie antreibt."

languages.text: «Ahora creemos que hay algo más. Que hay otro lado que no vemos. Una noción que es más amplia de lo que podemos llegar a computar. Algo superior a los miedos y a las necesidades. Algo que los impulsa».
languages.original_text: "Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora creemos que hay algo más. Que hay otro lado que no vemos. Una noción que es más amplia de lo que podemos llegar a computar. Algo superior a los miedos y a las necesidades. Algo que los impulsa».

languages.text: 「それだけではないと思うようになってきた。私たちには見えない別の側面があると思う。私たちが計算できるものよりも、遥かに大きな概念。恐怖や欲求を凌駕する何か。彼らを駆り立てる何かがあると」
languages.original_text: "Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

traits.locale_text: 「それだけではないと思うようになってきた。私たちには見えない別の側面があると思う。私たちが計算できるものよりも、遥かに大きな概念。恐怖や欲求を凌駕する何か。彼らを駆り立てる何かがあると」

languages.text: "Artık hepsinin bundan ibaret olmadığını düşünüyoruz. Göremediğimiz başka bir yön daha var. Hesaplayabildiğimizden daha büyük bir kavram... Korkuların ve ihtiyaçların üzerinde kalan, onları harekete geçiren bir şey..."
languages.original_text: "Now we think that there is more. That there is another side that we do not see. A notion that is larger than what we can compute. Something that stands above fears and needs. Something that drives them."

traits.locale_text: "Artık daha fazlası olduğunu düşünüyoruz. Göremediğimiz başka bir yön daha var. Hesaplayabildiğimizden daha büyük bir kavram... Korkuların ve ihtiyaçların üzerinde yer alan, onları harekete geçiren bir şey..."
